name: The Aelonai Order
declaringWar: My condolences, but the Order have come to end you. May the best of us win.
attacked: Have you come to meet your maker?
defeated: Very well. Will your triumph have me in robes before I die?
introduction: Hello. Welcome to the Aelonai Order. Have you come to join, or have you come to pray?
tradeRequest: Come, see what I have in store.
uniques: [+2 Happiness, +2 Culture] [in capital] <when not at war>
[+1 Production, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <when at war>
May buy [Solic Blades] units for [75] [Faith] [in all cities] <after discovering [Iron Working]> <before discovering [Gunpowder]>
